Plot Varible Importance

Source: R/plotVarImp.R
plotVarImp.Rd

Plot the variable importance as a bar plot.

plotVarImp(df, color = "grey")

Arguments

df

data.frame. A data.frame containing the the name of the variabels as first column and the value of the varible importance as second column.
color

character. The color of the bar plot, default is grey.

Value

The ggplot object.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
plotVarImp(my_table, color = '#a1d99b')
# }

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
